metadata.title: Wednesday, 25th February, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a)    when Chief Mulilo of Chama District will be recognised by the Government; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in recognising the Chief.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether feasibility studies for tarring the Mbala-Kasaba Bay-Nsumbu road have been carried out;
(b)    if so, when works on the road will commence;
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d)    when the construction of the Lufubu Bridge across the Lufubu River on the road at (a) will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Agriculture and Livestock what the total number of cattle and goats earmarked for restocking in Muchinga Parliamentary Constituency is.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the rehabilitation of Sesheke Airstrip will commence;
(b)    what the time-frame for the completion of the project is; and
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development when the Rural Electrification Authority will electrify Mubamba, Kanyembo and other rural schools in Nchelenge Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when the Government will construct staff houses for health personnel in Sikongo District; and
(b)    when a utility motor vehicle will be provided to the Department of Community Development and Social Welfare.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when Gombe Primary School in Waya Ward in Kabwe Central Parliamentary Constituency will be upgraded to a Secondary School; and
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to build more secondary schools in Waya Ward to cater for children from surrounding areas.
(a)    when dip tanks in cattle breeding areas in Kapiri Mposhi Parliamentary Constituency will be constructed; and
(b)    when sprayraces will be installed.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth and Sport when a youth resource centre will be constructed in Nkeyema District.

parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to construct a modern subordinate court building in Serenje District;
(b)    if so, when the construction will commence; and
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the construction of a road from Chief Mboroma to Chief Mbosha’s area in Mkushi South Parliamentary Constituency will commence.

parts: (a)    how much money was owed to the Nitrogen Chemicals of Zambia retirees as of October, 2014; and
(b)    when the retirees will be paid their terminal benefits.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when the K50,000 that was approved for the women associations in Nchelenge District in 2012 will be released; and
(b)    when the payment of funds to the non-eligible beneficiaries under the Social Cash Transfer Scheme in Nchelenge District will be stopped.

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs when the construction of palaces for the following traditional leaders in Serenje District will commence
parts: (a)    Chieftainess Serenje;
(b)    Chief Mailo; and
(c)    Chief Chisomo.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing whether land for constructing a modern shopping mall in Kabwe Central Parliamentary Constituency has been identified.
